remarks: A weak version of ~ rexv not using ~ ax-ext (nor ~ df-cleq , ~ df-clel , ~ df-v ) with an additional dv condition to avoid dependency on ~ ax-13 as well.  See ~ bj-ralvw .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-rexvwv.1 $e |- ps $.
bj-rexvwv $p |- ( E. x e. { y | ps } ph <-> E. x ph ) $.
$d x y $.
